title: Jermall & Jermell Charlo | Ep 45 | ALL THE SMOKE Full Episode | SHOWTIME Basketball

description:
On episode 45 of All The Smoke, Matt and Stephen are joined by boxing stars Jermell and Jermall Charlo as they discuss their upcoming PPV doubleheader on SHOWTIME this Saturday.
